commissions.title: Commissions 101
commissions.content: Learn how real estate commissions became standard at 5-6% and how they impact buyers and sellers today.

steering.title: Steering Explained
steering.content: Understand how steering happens when agents guide buyers toward listings with higher commissions â€” and how to spot it.

savingMoney.title: Saving Money on Agent Fees
savingMoney.content: Learn negotiation strategies to keep more equity when buying or selling without traditional commissions.

negotiatingFees.title: Negotiating Your Fees
negotiatingFees.content: Discover how to structure your offer to maximize seller concessions and reduce your closing costs.
